text: Shadows Inside is the sixth studio album from American metalcore band Miss May I. Released on 2 June 2017, this was the band's first release on SharpTone Records after leaving Rise Records. The music video for "Lost In The Grey" was directed by Ramon Boutviseth. == Track listing == == Chart positions == ;Albums {|class="wikitable" |- ! rowspan="2"| Year ! rowspan="2"| Album ! rowspan="2"| Label ! colspan="4"| Chart peaks |- ! style="width:50px;"| US ! style="width:50px;"| US Rock ! style="width:50px;"| US Indie ! style="width:50px;"| US Hard Rock |- |2017 |Shadows Inside | style="text-align:center;"| SharpTone | style="text-align:center;"| 176 | style="text-align:center;"| 37 | style="text-align:center;"| 6 | style="text-align:center;"| 6 |- ! colspan="8"| "—" denotes a release that did not chart. |} ==References== Category:2017 albums Category:Miss May I albums Category:SharpTone Records albums
